name: Velvet Generation
description:
This is a set of API helpers for Velvet Generation.
* It automatically sets all d6 dice dragged from chat onto the table to be controlled by all players.
* It enables the `!amped` command, which rerolls all 1s in a selection
* It enables the `onFire|*` command, which sets all 1s in a selection to the number indicated by *.

useroptions.name: Players can use --ids
useroptions.description: Select this option to allow players to use the `--ids` parameter to specify tokens they don't control to be modified.
